parameter.name: prettyOutput
parameter.description: If the prettyOutput is specified as 1, will return an indented response of the output.

parameter.name: fields
parameter.description: The array of fileds to be returned in the output.

parameter.name: userId
parameter.description: The ID of the user who's activities to fetch.

parameter.name: type
parameter.description: The type of the activity. This is in correlation with the key_string parameter of ActivityTypes.

parameter.name: limit
parameter.description: The number of items shown per page.

parameter.name: startDate
parameter.description: The date, activities to fetch from. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameter.name: endDate
parameter.description: The date, activities to fetch until. Format: YYYY-MM-DD

parameter.name: isDone
parameter.description: The status of the activity, possible values are 0,1.
